CustomField.description: Do not manually update. Updated by automatic processes. See excluded Record Types in Household Settings.Do not manually update. Updated by automatic processes. See excluded Record Types in Household Settings.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The date of the last (hard credit) gift from this Account. See "Combined Last Gift Date" for date of last gift overall (hard or soft credit) from this Account. Calculated by NPSP Customizable Rollups.
CustomField.label: Last Gift Date
